title: Review: The Cervelo Caledonia-5 Didn’t Really Need to Be Updated (but We’re Glad It Was)
content:
The Caledonia-5 adds in frame-storage to what is already one of the best all-road bikes you'll find, but is that enough?

Read the full article at Review: The Cervelo Caledonia-5 Didn’t Really Need to Be Updated (but We’re Glad It Was) on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
